segments.text: Bruno Bistro , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , hello , I would like to make a reservation please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly sir , For which day and time please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry sir , but we are fully booked tonight until eight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , eight o'clock is fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , and how many people will attend tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lastly , may I please know what name I should make the reservation under ?
segments.speaker: S1
